{{alias}}()
    Returns a regular expression to match a UTF-16 surrogate pair.

    Returns
    -------
    re: RegExp
        Regular expression.

    Examples
    --------
    > var RE = {{alias}}();
    > var bool = RE.test( 'abc\uD800\uDC00def' )
    true
    > bool = RE.test( 'abcdef' )
    false


{{alias}}.REGEXP
    Regular expression to match a UTF-16 surrogate pair.

    Examples
    --------
    > var RE = {{alias}}.REGEXP;
    > var bool = RE.test( 'abc\uD800\uDC00def' )
    true
    > bool = RE.test( 'abcdef' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
